"A.D.2028/4/23/14:00": "Mother!"
"I've been waiting for you, Hitsugi Yasaka. <%me> too."
"It looks like some extra people tagged along... I'll tolerate it. I will forgive you for stepping foot into this place."
"Aren't you the arrogant one, Mother? You almost act like we're trespassing into your territory."
"Strangely enough, that phrase works perfectly."
"It's exactly as you said, Enga Yasaka. This place is a part of me."
"<%me>. Don't you remember this place? You should know a place very similar to this."
"1. The center of the mothership"
"2. Inside of Xion"
"Indeed. This is a place that I myself have created. This is my place, fixated to this world."
"I was born through the Photoners, and through their selfishness, abandoned into subspace for such a long time... wandering space, eventually making my way to ancient Earth."
"My, how long ago was that... I collided with the Earth, and that shockwave forever changed Earth, carrying out a new evolution."
"I, who broke into pieces upon impact with the Earth, began to re-assemble in one place and took shape."
"This shape, my body, is what they named \"The Moon\". This place."
"No way, you were the Giant Impact?!"
"Impressive knowledge, Enga Yasaka. Yes, that's what earthlings named the creation of the moon."
"Though, it wasn't a planet that hit the Earth. It was an abandoned clone of an akashic record, although they obviously couldn't know that."
"ESCA Darkers?! Even in this place?!"
"Don't interfere, lowly Darkers. I'm still here. My goal is still achieveable."
"I... I... My desires... To regain my functions as a clone of Xion... and exact revenge upon the Photoners who threw me away."
"I will prove that I am not a failure."
"I do not wish for the destruction of this world! I couldn't care less about Photons and where they came from. This all exists as nothing more than a tool for me!"
"I will... what I must do is... become one... With the Earth, moon, and stars and... triumph over my creators!"
"You... absorbed Aru for that reason? To gain power for your revenge?"
"Correct. Through my control of Photons, my plan will succeed."
"Aru... The fusion of Dark Falz, Ether, and Photons... A suitable body for my goals."
"However, the connections that remain within him... Hitsugi Yasaka and <%me>... Your connections continue to justify his existence."
"This connection must be severed. To do so... I'll have both of you die."
"1. The Photoners are already extinct"
"2. What do you see beyond your revenge?"
"That just proves my point! If they met their demise, and I'm still here, that's absolute proof that my existence was correct all along!"
"I don't know! I'm not an omniscient being! But I know that I will usher in a new future when I accomplish my desire!"
"...There's no point in answering more of these questions... Isn't that right, Hitsugi Yasaka?"
"You're right, Mother. My goal is to take back Aru. For that... I will defeat you."
"My goal is revenge on the Photoners. For that, I will kill both Hitsugi Yasaka and <%me>."
"It seems we have come to an impasse."
"It seems so."
"Come now, child of purification! If you believe you are righteous, defeat me and save him... Save Aru from inside of me!"
"Quest progress has been saved."
